glosses: crescendo (instruction to play gradually more loudly)

raw_glosses: (rare) crescendo (gradual increase, especially to a dramatic climax)
glosses: crescendo (gradual increase, especially to a dramatic climax)

words.etymology_text: Borrowed from French croissant, present participle of verb croître (“to grow”).
From French crème fraîche. This is the spelling that is found in Kotus’s wordlist.
